bibl.title: Copyists of Oxyrhynchus.

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.title: Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts
bibl.author: PARSONS, Peter

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Professionals and amateurs. - Copyists as individuals. - Copyists and scriptoria. - Calligraphies. - The copyist and the classical tradition.
A.K. BOWMAN, R.A. COLES, N. GONIS, D. OBBINK, P.J. PARSONS (Edd.), Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 93 (London, 2007) pp. 262-270.
